sec.title: Web URLs; Internal Fidus Writer document links, Anchors
sec.p: Internal link in the document to a header anchor and to an anchor.

disp-quote.p: Here below is the full list of ten books that have shaped my life – one basketball book, one joke book, one autobiography, three novels, and four history books. One never knows which books will change your life and therein lies one of the greatest joys of reading. https://t.co/biMVo4ylZL

sec.title: Copyright information using Fidus Writer document information setting

fn.p: A note with a citation in it? (Rossignol 2017)
